lines.text: My name's Petulia Danner. I've been married for six months and I haven't had an affair yet.
I turned those gentle hands into fists. You were the gentlest man I ever knew.
I want to go to bed.

[to Archie, regarding his divorce]
I'll let you in on a little secret; I wish I had your courage.
Careful! Can't you tell I'm not wearing a bra?
Don't think about it. It'll only excite you...
If I come for you, let me have a flair. Right between the eyes.

[to Petulia]
You have a very superior pelvis.
What was it, Archie, the "sex" bit? Huh? The ol' "sex" bit?
